page.title: 05A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: I usually get up at 7.30a.m.on Saturdays.Iwash and change,and have my breakfast(usually cereal but sometimes toast and jam or sausage and egg).I watch breakfast television and play with my toys.At about 9.30a.m. I get ready to walk up with my mother or father to Holywell.It takes about 15 minutes to walk up.The swimming pool opens at 10a.m.I go swimming while my mother does the weekend shopping.Sometimes I go up on the bus,the bus fare for children is 24p,for adults it is 32p.It costs 27p to go swimming.You can stay in the water as long as you like.I usually stay for 3 hours.I take sandwiches to eat in the park.The park is next to the swimming pool.Sometimes I go to town and buy a bag of chips.I met my mother in town and we walk home.
